1100360.name: Slot Gun
1100360.description:
Slotgun is a satisfying deckbuilding slot-machine game where you face off against several opponents to control the board. Roll you deck and control a cannon by timing your clicks to play the slot gun machine. Your roll will determine whether you shoot a single shot or thousands of balls. Your goal? Hit blocks to turn them into your color and dominate the board.

Game Features:

  • Craft your slot machine deck with a growing collection of symbols. Every symbol changes the way your cannon will fire and how many shots it will fire.

  • Combine specific symbols for special events that can improve your deck or change the entire course of the game.

  • Control the board by turning everything to your color!

  • Do It Again. Multiple modes, difficulties, number of enemies, and random events make the game infinitely replayable.
